path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Crypto Titan Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.TITN: Experiments/contracts/Crypto Titan Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit/TITN

findings.title: Out of gas exception if there will be a long addresses list.
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees and may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.
